<Link id="l00085" /><CodeLine lineNumber="85"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &amp;Child : ContextTracker.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/samplecontexttracker/#a42ff5d19f024e956412b151ae3a095ec">getRootContext</a>().<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/contexttrienode/#a0f957c3b9a4c1c915ff992784abea057">getAllChildContext</a>()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00086" /><CodeLine lineNumber="86"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/contexttrienode">ContextTrieNode</a> &#42;Callee = &amp;Child.second;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00087" /><CodeLine lineNumber="87"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sampleprof/profiledcallgraph/#abb2f80085f5ee5fd2f1c262f067f8be2">addProfiledFunction</a>(Callee-&gt;getFuncName());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00088" /><CodeLine lineNumber="88"><span class="doxyHighlight">      Queue.push(Callee);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00089" /><CodeLine lineNumber="89"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00090" /><CodeLine lineNumber="90"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00091" /><CodeLine lineNumber="91"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">while</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!Queue.empty()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00092" /><CodeLine lineNumber="92"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/contexttrienode">ContextTrieNode</a> &#42;Caller = Queue.front();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00093" /><CodeLine lineNumber="93"><span class="doxyHighlight">      Queue.pop();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00094" /><CodeLine lineNumber="94"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sampleprof/functionsamples">FunctionSamples</a> &#42;CallerSamples = Caller-&gt;getFunctionSamples();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00095" /><CodeLine lineNumber="95"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00096" /><CodeLine lineNumber="96"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Add calls for context.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00097" /><CodeLine lineNumber="97"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Note that callsite target samples are completely ignored since they can</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00098" /><CodeLine lineNumber="98"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// conflict with the context edges, which are formed by context</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00099" /><CodeLine lineNumber="99"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// compression during profile generation, for cyclic SCCs. This may</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00100" /><CodeLine lineNumber="100"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// further result in an SCC order incompatible with the purely</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00101" /><CodeLine lineNumber="101"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// context-based one, which may in turn block context-based inlining.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00102" /><CodeLine lineNumber="102"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &amp;Child : Caller-&gt;getAllChildContext()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00103" /><CodeLine lineNumber="103"><span class="doxyHighlight">        <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/contexttrienode">ContextTrieNode</a> &#42;Callee = &amp;Child.second;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00104" /><CodeLine lineNumber="104"><span class="doxyHighlight">        <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sampleprof/profiledcallgraph/#abb2f80085f5ee5fd2f1c262f067f8be2">addProfiledFunction</a>(Callee-&gt;getFuncName());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00105" /><CodeLine lineNumber="105"><span class="doxyHighlight">        Queue.push(Callee);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00106" /><CodeLine lineNumber="106"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00107" /><CodeLine lineNumber="107"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Fetch edge weight from the profile.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00108" /><CodeLine lineNumber="108"><span class="doxyHighlight">        uint64&#95;t Weight;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00109" /><CodeLine lineNumber="109"><span class="doxyHighlight">        <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sampleprof/functionsamples">FunctionSamples</a> &#42;CalleeSamples = Callee-&gt;getFunctionSamples();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00110" /><CodeLine lineNumber="110"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!CalleeSamples || !CallerSamples) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00111" /><CodeLine lineNumber="111"><span class="doxyHighlight">          Weight = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00112" /><CodeLine lineNumber="112"><span class="doxyHighlight">        &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00113" /><CodeLine lineNumber="113"><span class="doxyHighlight">          uint64&#95;t CalleeEntryCount = CalleeSamples-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sampleprof/functionsamples/#af757985efc97179779ea3fc9e84f4735">getHeadSamplesEstimate</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00114" /><CodeLine lineNumber="114"><span class="doxyHighlight">          uint64&#95;t CallsiteCount = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00115" /><CodeLine lineNumber="115"><span class="doxyHighlight">          <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/sampleprof/linelocation">LineLocation</a> Callsite = Callee-&gt;getCallSiteLoc();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00116" /><CodeLine lineNumber="116"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> CallTargets = CallerSamples-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sampleprof/functionsamples/#acbd03b8899e421aa9cab2850607a1b13">findCallTargetMapAt</a>(Callsite)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00117" /><CodeLine lineNumber="117"><span class="doxyHighlight">            </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> It = CallTargets-&gt;find(CalleeSamples-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sampleprof/functionsamples/#a7ff8c2d016ae9169f35cdd1d1aaa1564">getFunction</a>());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00118" /><CodeLine lineNumber="118"><span class="doxyHighlight">            </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (It != CallTargets-&gt;end())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00119" /><CodeLine lineNumber="119"><span class="doxyHighlight">              CallsiteCount = It-&gt;second;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00120" /><CodeLine lineNumber="120"><span class="doxyHighlight">          &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00121" /><CodeLine lineNumber="121"><span class="doxyHighlight">          Weight = std::max(CallsiteCount, CalleeEntryCount);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00122" /><CodeLine lineNumber="122"><span class="doxyHighlight">        &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00123" /><CodeLine lineNumber="123"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00124" /><CodeLine lineNumber="124"><span class="doxyHighlight">        addProfiledCall(Caller-&gt;getFuncName(), Callee-&gt;getFuncName(), Weight);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00125" /><CodeLine lineNumber="125"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00126" /><CodeLine lineNumber="126"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00127" /><CodeLine lineNumber="127"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00128" /><CodeLine lineNumber="128"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Trim edges with weight up to &#96;IgnoreColdCallThreshold&#96;. This aims</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00129" /><CodeLine lineNumber="129"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// for a more stable call graph with &quot;determinstic&quot; edges from run to run.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00130" /><CodeLine lineNumber="130"><span class="doxyHighlight">    trimColdEges(IgnoreColdCallThreshold);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00131" /><CodeLine lineNumber="131"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00132" /><CodeLine lineNumber="132"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00133" /><CodeLine lineNumber="133" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sampleprof/profiledcallgraph/#ae0ddc9bdb077cf643f29ddd1320bafb4"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sampleprof/profiledcallgraph/#a9bcc7eefa431e84d1636faf7d86fe225">iterator</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sampleprof/profiledcallgraph/#ae0ddc9bdb077cf643f29ddd1320bafb4">begin</a>() &#123; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Root.Edges.begin(); &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00134" /><CodeLine lineNumber="134" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sampleprof/profiledcallgraph/#add34fd6645cc6eb20b5210117cd4f767"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sampleprof/profiledcallgraph/#a9bcc7eefa431e84d1636faf7d86fe225">iterator</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sampleprof/profiledcallgraph/#add34fd6645cc6eb20b5210117cd4f767">end</a>() &#123; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Root.Edges.end(); &#125;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00136" /><CodeLine lineNumber="136"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00137" /><CodeLine lineNumber="137" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sampleprof/profiledcallgraph/#abb2f80085f5ee5fd2f1c262f067f8be2"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sampleprof/profiledcallgraph/#abb2f80085f5ee5fd2f1c262f067f8be2">addProfiledFunction</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sampleprof/functionid">FunctionId</a> Name) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00138" /><CodeLine lineNumber="138"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!ProfiledFunctions.count(Name)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00139" /><CodeLine lineNumber="139"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Link to synthetic root to make sure every node is reachable</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00140" /><CodeLine lineNumber="140"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// from root. This does not affect SCC order.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00141" /><CodeLine lineNumber="141"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Store the pointer of the node because the map can be rehashed.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00142" /><CodeLine lineNumber="142"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/classes/node">Node</a> =</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00146" /><CodeLine lineNumber="146"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00147" /><CodeLine lineNumber="147"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00150" /><CodeLine lineNumber="150"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> addProfiledCall(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sampleprof/functionid">FunctionId</a> CallerName, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sampleprof/functionid">FunctionId</a> CalleeName,</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00153" /><CodeLine lineNumber="153"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> CalleeIt = ProfiledFunctions.find(CalleeName);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00154" /><CodeLine lineNumber="154"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (CalleeIt == ProfiledFunctions.end())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00155" /><CodeLine lineNumber="155"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00156" /><CodeLine lineNumber="156"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/sampleprof/profiledcallgraphedge">ProfiledCallGraphEdge</a> Edge(ProfiledFunctions&#91;CallerName&#93;,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00157" /><CodeLine lineNumber="157"><span class="doxyHighlight">                               CalleeIt-&gt;second, Weight);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00158" /><CodeLine lineNumber="158"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &amp;Edges = ProfiledFunctions&#91;CallerName&#93;-&gt;Edges;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00159" /><CodeLine lineNumber="159"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#91;EdgeIt, Inserted&#93; = Edges.insert(Edge);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00160" /><CodeLine lineNumber="160"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!Inserted) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00161" /><CodeLine lineNumber="161"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Accumulate weight to the existing edge.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00162" /><CodeLine lineNumber="162"><span class="doxyHighlight">      Edge.Weight += EdgeIt-&gt;Weight;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00163" /><CodeLine lineNumber="163"><span class="doxyHighlight">      Edges.erase(EdgeIt);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00164" /><CodeLine lineNumber="164"><span class="doxyHighlight">      Edges.insert(Edge);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00165" /><CodeLine lineNumber="165"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00166" /><CodeLine lineNumber="166"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00172" /><CodeLine lineNumber="172"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &amp;&#91;Target, Frequency&#93; : Sample.second.getCallTargets()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00173" /><CodeLine lineNumber="173"><span class="doxyHighlight">        <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sampleprof/profiledcallgraph/#abb2f80085f5ee5fd2f1c262f067f8be2">addProfiledFunction</a>(Target);</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00186" /><CodeLine lineNumber="186"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00187" /><CodeLine lineNumber="187"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00188" /><CodeLine lineNumber="188"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Trim edges with weight up to &#96;Threshold&#96;. Do not trim anything if</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00189" /><CodeLine lineNumber="189"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// &#96;Threshold&#96; is zero.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00190" /><CodeLine lineNumber="190"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> trimColdEges(uint64&#95;t Threshold = 0) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00191" /><CodeLine lineNumber="191"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!Threshold)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00192" /><CodeLine lineNumber="192"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00193" /><CodeLine lineNumber="193"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00194" /><CodeLine lineNumber="194"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &amp;Node : ProfiledFunctions) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00195" /><CodeLine lineNumber="195"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &amp;Edges = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/rdf/#ac54dd04d6e441d1b72195477e5bc1909">Node</a>.second-&gt;Edges;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00196" /><CodeLine lineNumber="196"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> = Edges.begin();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00197" /><CodeLine lineNumber="197"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">while</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> != Edges.end()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00198" /><CodeLine lineNumber="198"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>-&gt;Weight &lt;= Threshold)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00199" /><CodeLine lineNumber="199"><span class="doxyHighlight">          <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> = Edges.erase(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00200" /><CodeLine lineNumber="200"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00201" /><CodeLine lineNumber="201"><span class="doxyHighlight">          <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>++;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00202" /><CodeLine lineNumber="202"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00203" /><CodeLine lineNumber="203"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00204" /><CodeLine lineNumber="204"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00205" /><CodeLine lineNumber="205"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00206" /><CodeLine lineNumber="206"><span class="doxyHighlight">  ProfiledCallGraphNode Root;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00207" /><CodeLine lineNumber="207"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// backing buffer for ProfiledCallGraphNodes.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00208" /><CodeLine lineNumber="208"><span class="doxyHighlight">  std::list&lt;ProfiledCallGraphNode&gt; ProfiledCallGraphNodeList;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00209" /><CodeLine lineNumber="209"><span class="doxyHighlight">  HashKeyMap&lt;llvm::DenseMap, FunctionId, ProfiledCallGraphNode&#42;&gt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00210" /><CodeLine lineNumber="210"><span class="doxyHighlight">      ProfiledFunctions;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00211" /><CodeLine lineNumber="211"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;;</span></CodeLine>
